events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly to assess your qualifications.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a Software Engineer candidate, based on the keywords in your resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be in touch with the next steps soon.
We conducted an initial screening interview to discuss your experience with software development and your interest in our engineering team.
Thank you for your quick response to our screening questions and for providing additional details on your background in software engineering.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer role with our lead developer on May 7th at 2 PM.
Your technical interview went well, and the panel was impressed with your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
We have arranged an HR interview to further discuss your fit with company culture and to go over benefits and policies.
The HR interview concluded positively, and they appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with our company's values.
We have officially extended you an offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer, including competitive salary and benefits.
